about_the_game:
Tales of Frah’Akin is an upcoming story-based fantasy RPG, in the style of the old classics but with a modern touch, rich with cinematic cutscenes.







Take the role of Ennea, the princess of the Forest Elves. Embark on a journey through the lands of Frah’Akin and discover more about a mysterious enemy that threatens the elven realm. Meet new companions along the way and reveal hidden truths about the past, present, and future. Your decisions will shape the world you reside in. Take destiny into your own hands!















NO random encounters! See your opponents ahead of time, then choose who to fight.

Use combo skills to take down enemies fast.

Auto battle for farming and fast leveling up.






Discover more about the world and people around you through interactions and side quests. Learn backstories and secrets of the past.

Explore the environment to find hidden gems and rewarding mini-games.

Mini-games include:
  • Fishing
  • Playing on instruments
  • Dancing
  • Training animals
  • Mining

Gather ingredients, learn how to craft items, and even make your own equipment.





  • A total of 13 playable characters, each with a unique set of skills, personalized quests, and backstory.
  • 2 sets of outfits for each character.
  • Custom character and background art, including scene-based CGs and talking sprite busts.
  • Custom OST with a captivating fairy-like theme song.
  • Fully voice-acted DEMO.
  • Possible romance through interactions between the characters.
detailed_description:
Demo Update!

Patch Notes ver1.1


Tales of Frah'Akin Demo ver 1.1 patch is here! This patch brings bug fixes and translation corrections, as well as new features in the demo. Thank you to everyone who’s reported bugs to me!

ver.1.1 Patch Notes:

💢[Bug Fixes]
Fixed a bug, where the game crashed after entering a map leading to Senersis' house.
Fixed a bug, where the game crashed during combat while using combo skills.

💛 NPCs
A new character interaction was added with a child playing the lute in the Forest Cave area.

🎮[Gameplay Updates]
A NEW boss fight was added in the Lost Forest!
